messages:
Name: Mauro Icardi
Nationality: Argentina
Date of Birth: February 19, 1993
Position: Attacker
Current club: Paris Saint-Germain
Ligue 1 clubs played for: Paris Saint-Germain
Paris Saint-Germain attacker Mauro Icardi hasn't been involved in any of the six matches that his side have played in the Ligue 1 so far in 2022/2023.
Icardi last featured in a Ligue 1 game on April 17, 2022, playing only one minute for Paris Saint-Germain versus Olympique Marseille in a 2-1 success.
In the team's next Ligue 1 game on September 10, Paris Saint-Germain - who are top of the table on 16 points - face a home match against Brest.
Icardi played 24 Ligue 1 games last season for Paris Saint-Germain and scored four goals.
Before linking up with Paris Saint-Germain in September 2020, Icardi made 188 league appearances in total at Internazionale, scoring 111 goals and providing 24 assists.

It was on September 14, 2019 that Icardi made his league debut, at the age of 26 years and 207 days, against Strasbourg. In his Ligue 1 career overall, he has played 64 times in the competition, with 23 goals scored and five assists.
